data.eml:eml: Hymenoptera from caves of Bakony Mountains, Hungary - an overlooked taxon in hypogean research

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vas, Zoltan, Kutasi, Csaba (2016): Hymenoptera from caves of Bakony Mountains, Hungary - an overlooked taxon in hypogean research. Subterranean Biology 19: 31-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.19.10016, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.19.10016
